sqls.sql: SELECT grid_bb_id, cell_sql_where, cell_color_background, cell_font_color, cell_style_to_row, ss_grid_bc_rmk01, ss_grid_bc_rmk02, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, crt_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, upd_time FROM ss_grid_bc WHERE grid_bc_id = @grid_bc_id;
